name: Samurais vs Ninja: Stupid Color Drawing Game
name_original: Samurais vs Ninja: Stupid Color Drawing Game
description:
Samurai vs Ninja is a simple yet addictive puzzle game.

Connect matching Samurais & Ninjas with pipe to create a flow. Pair all guys, and cover the entire board to solve each puzzle. But watch out, pipes will break if they cross or overlap!

Free play through hundreds of levels, or race against the clock in Time Trial mode. Gameplay ranges from simple and relaxed, to challenging and frenetic, and everywhere in between. How you play is up to you. So, give "Samurai vs Ninja: Stupid Color Drawing Game" a try and enjoy ! :)
